options.content:
This dashboard features a comparison of archived product on all LTA

Time reference for this dashboard is : sensing_start_date

Important notice : Tables & timelines can only display up to 10 000 entries. Please make use of filters to narrow down the retrieved data and get a more realistic view.

targets.query: satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level: $product_level AND LTA_Acri_is_published: true
satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level: $product_level AND LTA_Werum_is_published: true
satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level: $product_level AND LTA_CloudFerro_is_published: true
satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level: $product_level AND LTA_Exprivia_S1_is_published: true
satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level: $product_level AND LTA_Exprivia_S2_is_published: true
satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level: $product_level AND LTA_Exprivia_S3_is_published: true
satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level: $product_level AND LTA_Acri_is_published: true

satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level: $product_level AND (LTA_Exprivia_S1_is_published: true OR LTA_Exprivia_S2_is_published: true OR LTA_Exprivia_S3_is_published: true)
satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level: $product_level AND LTA_Werum_is_published: true
satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level: $product_level AND LTA_CloudFerro_is_published: true

satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND (LTA_${all_lta}_is_published: true OR LTA_${all_lta}_S1_is_published: true OR LTA_${all_lta}_S2_is_published: true OR LTA_${all_lta}_S3_is_published: true ) AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level: $product_level

satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND (LTA_${all_lta}_is_published: true OR LTA_${all_lta}_S1_is_published: true OR LTA_${all_lta}_S2_is_published: true OR LTA_${all_lta}_S3_is_published: true ) AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level: $product_level
mission: $mission AND satellite_unit : $satellite AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level:$product_level AND nb_lta_served: [1 TO *]

panels.title: Products Published by at least one LTA

panels.description: Total Archived Products by LTA and also published @AUXIP

targets.query: satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND (LTA_${lta}_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S1_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S2_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S3_is_published: true ) AND product_type: $product_type

panels.title: Products Archived by LTA

targets.query: satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type: $product_type AND nb_lta_served: [1 TO *] AND NOT (LTA_${lta}_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S1_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S2_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S3_is_published: true )
mission: $mission AND satellite_unit : $satellite AND product_type: $product_type AND product_level:$product_level AND nb_lta_served: [1 TO *]

satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type: $product_type AND nb_lta_served: [1 TO *] AND NOT (LTA_${lta}_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S1_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S2_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S3_is_published: true )

satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type: $product_type AND nb_lta_served: [1 TO *] AND NOT (LTA_${lta}_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S1_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S2_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S3_is_published: true )

satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type: $product_type AND nb_lta_served: [1 TO *] AND NOT (LTA_${lta}_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S1_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S2_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S3_is_published: true )

mission: $mission AND satellite_unit : $satellite AND (LTA_${lta}_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S1_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S2_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S3_is_published: true )
AND product_type: $product_type AND (prip_id: * OR auxip_id: * OR (mission:S5 AND product_level:L0_))

satellite_unit : $satellite AND mission: $mission AND product_level:$product_level AND product_type: $product_type AND nb_lta_served: [1 TO *] AND NOT (LTA_${lta}_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S1_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S2_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S3_is_published: true )

panels.title: Not Archived products per product type

panels.description: Total Archived Products by LTA and also published @AUXIP

targets.query:
mission: $mission AND satellite_unit : $satellite AND (LTA_${lta}_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S1_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S2_is_published: true OR LTA_${lta}_S3_is_published: true )
AND product_type: $product_type AND (prip_id: * OR auxip_id: * OR (mission:S5 AND product_level:L0_))

panels.title: List of Archived Products
